price: Агар ростгўй бўлсалар, унга ўхшаш бир гапни келтирсинлар-чи!
arabic: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falyatū biḥadīthin mith'lihi in kānū ṣādiqīna
